txt.en: You have caught the Old River King! Dúdrad will be thrilled.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Edoras quests must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras takes place.</rgb>
You have caught the Old River King!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Edoras quests must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras takes place.</rgb>
Dúdrad's fishing area can be found where the river meets the road, just outside of the south-west wall of Edoras.\n\nYou should gift your catch to Dúdrad.

'You did it, [placeholder]! You caught him! I will mount him on a plaque with your name engraved upon it, and it will be a treasure in Edoras.

'A king he is. Will you look at the size of him? My arms tremble under his weight!

'This is a great gift from a great fisherman. You have lifted the gloom from my heart, [placeholder]!'
(Must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras)
